title: The Holden Story
brief_description: The Holden Story traces the company’s history from its earliest days as a mass producer of harness to the Australian Boer War contingent through to the latest developments in automotive factories which will change the face of tomorrow’s industry. “The Holden Story” is a story of optimism and depression, national pride and international competition. Rated: G
